title: Billionaire Mike Novogratz Admits He Was Wrong About XRP and Praises Its Community
description: Mike Novogratz, the founder and CEO of Galaxy Digital, has revealed his views toward the Ripple-supported digital currency XRP have been shifting, acknowledging its significant presence in the industry and the commitment of its community, often termed the “XRP army.” Speaking on Raoul Pal’s Real Vision show, Novogratz revisited his previous skepticism about Ripple XRP […]
